SpellFlowLanguage.diagram.helperClasses

Class StepContextMenuProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.jface.action.ContributionManager
      • org.eclipse.jface.action.MenuManager
        • org.eclipse.gef.ContextMenuProvider
          • SpellFlowLanguage.diagram.helperClasses.GoUpContextMenuProvider
            • SpellFlowLanguage.diagram.helperClasses.GoDeeperContextMenuProvider
              • SpellFlowLanguage.diagram.helperClasses.StepContextMenuProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.jface.action.IContributionItem, org.eclipse.jface.action.IContributionManager, org.eclipse.jface.action.IMenuListener, org.eclipse.jface.action.IMenuManager

    public class StepContextMenuProvider
extends GoDeeperContextMenuProvider
    This class builds up the context menu for the Step nodes, i.e.,
    - if underlying nodes are available, add "go deeper entry";
    - if Goto buttons are available which have this Step node as target, then add entry "GOTO in line [add corresponding line]". Note, each Step may be the target of more than one Goto.
    Author:
    susann.gottmann

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void buildContextMenu(org.eclipse.jface.action.IMenuManager menu)
      Build context menu, i.e., if the underlying EditPart is a StepActivityEditPart and if the corresponding StepActivity has children elements, then enable the "Go deeper" action.
